message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a little high for me.  Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $120 for the product.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we settle at a price closer to the middle?
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get at least $130 for the product.
